strings.evolution:
How strange...
I feel so light on my feet
all of a sudden.
strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt and an accomplished captain, his affable disposition has endeared him to his subordinates. Rain commands an airship with his best friend Lasswell, who was taken in by Rain's family as an orphan. Though Rain's meddlesome nature sometimes annoys his friend, Lasswell goes along with Rain's orders from time to time out of respect for all he has done for him.
strings.fusion:
Who knew you could gain
such strength from visions!?
strings.summon:
I wonder if there are any
cute girls around here, or at
least some tasty treats.

strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. A precocious pilot who was entrusted with command of an airship at the tender age of eighteen, he maintains a carefree—some might say lackadaisical—demeanor. He has the unwavering trust of both the king and the populace, in large part due to his father's reputation as a stalwart knight of the kingdom.
strings.fusion:
Interesting...
I feel like I've grown a bit stronger.
strings.summon: Where should we head to next?

strings.evolution:
What is this strange feeling...?
As if some sort of power has been
unlocked deep inside of me...
strings.affinity:
We've been through a lot together.
I hope you feel that I am more
dependable now than I was before.
strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he and his friend Lasswell are considered two of the most formidable knights to grace the Royal Guard since Rain's father Sir Raegen. Though he harbors conflicted feelings toward his father for having abandoned him and his family, he keeps this to himself when in the presence of Lasswell, who still deeply respects the man.
strings.fusion:
At last I understand.
True power comes from within.
strings.summon:
This may seem out of character,
but I'm ready to get out there and fight!
...Seriously!

strings.evolution:
This feeling...
It's as if my sword skills have reached a whole new level.
strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt, he has complicated feelings about his father Sir Raegen, an illustrious knight in his own respect who inexplicably vanished one day, leaving his family behind. Blessed with natural talents beyond his own comprehension, he is able to quickly acquire skills that would take most people years to master.
strings.fusion:
I can't wait to show everyone
what I'm truly made of!
strings.summon:
Huh...!? It's my turn?
It's not that I don't want to help.
Really, I do!

strings.evolution:
What is this...?
I feel filled with some unknown power.
strings.affinity:
We've been through a lot together.
I hope you feel that I am more
dependable now than I was before.
strings.description: A knight of the Kingdom of Grandshelt. Though usually preoccupied chasing girls, on his journey chasing after the Sworn Six of Paladia who attacked his homeland a gentler, more courageous side of him came through. At a young age he came in contact with the earth crystal, but little did he know that would become the catalyst that sealed his fate.
strings.fusion:
Alright, this'll do for now.
However, there are no limits to my power.
